instructions:
1. Pulse chickpeas in food processor. There should be some large pieces remaining
  2. Add eggs, 2 tsp olive oil, garam masala, cayenne pepper and 1/8 tsp salt to a bowl
  3. Whisk contents of bowl
  4. Add chickpeas, breadcrumbs, 1/2 cup yogurt, scallions, 2 tbsp cilantro and shallot to bowl and mix
  5. Make 6 patties, about 1/2 cup each
  6. Heat 2 tsp oil in pan and cook patties 8-10 minutes
Source: America's Test Kitchen Healthy Family Cookbook
